name: panelling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
flat, usually rectangular parts, or pieces of wood, metal, cloth, etc., that fit into or onto something larger: wood panelling The house has original Georgian panelling. See
panel
More examplesFewer examplesThe rooms feature delicately carved wall panelling.The walls were lined with light oak panelling.The room had an enormous fireplace with marble panelling.
